huge; enormous; tremendous
огромный; громадный; огромный

heisig_chinese_memo: A dragon needs something bigger than a house to live in like a huge cave.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A dragon needs something bigger than a house to live in like a huge cave.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Guang " to the sound of " Dragon ", " Guang " is like a house with walls on three sides. As the symbol of " Pang ", it refers to house in general, see " Guang ". The original meaning is a tall house, later extended to be tall and righteous.

The oracle bone inscriptions may be added from "廾", and the combination of "廾" and " dragon " is " Gong ", which is the sound symbol of " Pang ". " Pang " simplified characters is " huge ." "Said Wen": "Pang, high house. Congguang, dragon sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The high house is also high. So the word is from the wide. The extension is Van Gogh's 偁." Ya": "Simu Pang Pang." Chuan said: "Pang Pang, fullness." Cong Guang, Long Sheng."

" Pang " is not seen in bronze inscriptions, but the names are written in oracle bone inscriptions, such as "Compilation" 19527: "Pang 㞢 (有) Gu", "㞢" means there is a disaster, " Gu " means disaster, the whole sentence means that the person named Pang has disaster ; Also used as a place name, such as "Collection" 7358: "Yu Yu Pang Ci", " Yu " means the first person pronoun I or we, "次" means stationed troops, the whole sentence means our troops are stationed in Pangdi.

Chinese characters are mostly used as surnames, such as "Chinese Seal Characters": "Pang Pigan".
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Guang " and " Dragon ", the original meaning is a tall house, and later it is extended to be tall and righteous.
humanum_full_description:
从「广」，「龍」聲，「广」象三面有牆的房屋，作為「龐」字的義符，泛指房屋，參見「广」。本義為高大的房屋，後引申為高大義。

　　甲骨文或加從「廾」，「廾」與「龍」組合為「龔」，作為「龐」的聲符。「龐」的簡化字為「庞」。《說文》：「龐，高屋也。从广，龍聲。」段玉裁注：「高屋也。謂屋之高者也，故字从广。引伸之，爲凡高大之偁。《小雅》：『四牡龐龐。』傳曰：『龐龐，充實也。』从广，龍聲。」

　　「龐」未見於金文，甲骨文作人名，如《合集》19527：「龐㞢（有）蠱」，「㞢」表示有，「蠱」表示災害，全句意謂名為龐的人有災禍；亦作地名，如《合集》7358：「余于龐次」，「余」表示第一人稱代詞我或我們，「次」表示駐紮部隊，全句意謂我們的部隊在龐地駐紮。

　　漢印文字中多用作姓氏，如《漢印文字徵》：「龐比干」。
humanum_short_description: 从「广」，「龍」聲，本義為高大的房屋，後引申為高大義。

Meaning: huge

Story: A dragon needs something bigger than a house to live in like a huge cave.
Kind: traditional

从「 广 」，「 龍 」聲，「 广 」象三面有牆的房屋，作為「 龐 」字的義符，泛指房屋，參見「 广 」。本義為高大的房屋，後引申為高大義。 甲骨文或加從「 廾 」，「 廾 」與「 龍 」組合為「 龔 」，作為「 龐 」的聲符。「 龐 」的簡化字為「 庞 」。《說文》：「龐，高屋也。从广，龍聲。」段玉裁注：「高屋也。謂屋之高者也，故字从广。引伸之，爲凡高大之偁。《小雅》：『四牡龐龐。』傳曰：『龐龐，充實也。』从广，龍聲。」 「 龐 」未見於金文，甲骨文作人名，如《合集》19527：「龐㞢（有）蠱」，「 㞢 」表示有，「 蠱 」表示災害，全句意謂名為龐的人有災禍；亦作地名，如《合集》7358：「余于龐次」，「 余 」表示第一人稱代詞我或我們，「 次 」表示駐紮部隊，全句意謂我們的部隊在龐地駐紮。 漢印文字中多用作姓氏，如《漢印文字徵》：「龐比干」。
From " Guang" to the sound of " Dragon", " Guang" is like a house with walls on three sides. As the symbol of " Pang", it refers to house in general, see " Guang". The original meaning is a tall house, later extended to be tall and righteous. The oracle bone inscriptions may be added from " 廾", and the combination of " 廾" and " dragon" is " Gong", which is the sound symbol of " Pang". " Pang" simplified characters is " huge." "Said Wen": "Pang, high house. Congguang, dragon sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The high house is also high. So the word is from the wide. The extension is Van Gogh's 偁." Ya": "Simu Pang Pang." Chuan said: "Pang Pang, fullness." Cong Guang, Long Sheng." " Pang" is not seen in bronze inscriptions, but the names are written in oracle bone inscriptions, such as "Compilation" 19527: "Pang 㞢 (有) Gu", " 㞢" means there is a disaster, " Gu" means disaster, the whole sentence means that the person named Pang has disaster ; Also used as a place name, such as "Collection" 7358: "Yu Yu Pang Ci", " Yu" means the first person pronoun I or we, " 次" means stationed troops, the whole sentence means our troops are stationed in Pangdi. Chinese characters are mostly used as surnames, such as "Chinese Seal Characters": "Pang Pigan".

龐字的基本解释

龐
páng
见“庞”。

龐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［páng］
［《廣韻》薄江切，平江，並。］
“庞1”的繁体字。亦作“龎1”。
(1)大。
(2)形容器物坚实。
(3)面庞。
(4)象声词。参见“龐龐”。
(5)用同“庬”。多而杂。
(6)姓。战国魏有庞涓。见《史记·孙子吴起列传》。
[②]［lóng］
［《集韻》盧東切，平東，來。］
“庞2”的繁体字。
充实。参见“龐2龐”。

龐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【龍字部】　龐； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1537第03
【廣韻】薄江切【集韻】【韻會】皮江切，?音胮。【說文】高屋也。　又雜亂貌。【書·周官】不和政龐。　又姓。周畢公高後，封於龐，因氏焉。　又【集韻】【韻會】?盧東切，音籠。【集韻】充實也。【詩·小雅】四牡龐龐。【前漢·司馬相如傳】湛恩龐洪。　又地名。【前漢·地理志】九眞郡都龐。　又【集韻】力鍾切【韻會】【正韻】盧容切，?音龍。義同。　又【集韻】蒲蒙切，音蓬。充牣也。

龐字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
龐字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［páng］
["Guangyun" Bo Jiangqie, Pingjiang, and. ]
Traditional characters of "庞1". Also known as "Pang 1".
(1) Big.
(2) The container is solid.
(3) Face.
(4) Onomatopoeia. See "Pang Pang".
(5) Use the same as "庬". Many and miscellaneous.
(6) Last name. Wei You Pang Juan in the Warring States Period. See "Historical Records · The Biography of Sun Tzu Wu Qi".
[②]［lóng］
["Jiyun" Lu Dongqie, Pingdong, come. ]
Traditional characters of "庞2".
Substantial. See "Pang 2 Pang".

After Zhou Bi Gonggao, Feng Yu Pang, Yin Shi Yan.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Lu Dongqie, sound cage. [Jiyun] It is also substantial. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Simu Pang Pang. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Zhan En Panghong.　Also place name. [Former Han Geography] Jiuyu County is the capital of Pang.　[Jiyun] Li Zhongqie [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Lu Rongqie,? Yinlong.
